title: Detecting Virtual Machines and Sandbox
preview: Malware analysts routinely examine suspicious code in isolated environments like virtual machines (VMs) or sandboxes.
author: HamidReza Mohseniyan

title: Attack And Defense SMB
preview: SMB (Server Message Block) is a network file-sharing protocol that allows systems to share files, printers, and other resources over a network. It is primarily used in Windows, but also supported by Linux (via Samba) and macOS.
author: HamidReza Mohseniyan
